features.situation: on DX and DX-based skill rolls to keep your feet or avoid being knocked down in combat
on all rolls to keep your feet if the surface is wet, slippery or unstable

to Parry with Blade!
from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)

from others

mJAGtjTq6PpPdBSpC.name: Crippling
mJAGtjTq6PpPdBSpC.notes: Duration: 3d minutes; Precludes all skill use

mtRlhNp_hV9-S6S-G.name: Severe

mJRaKqIj1shqVGN26.name: Mild
mJRaKqIj1shqVGN26.notes: Duration: 2d seconds; -2 on all skill rolls

tZ5xQzBcSh8pJrBot.notes: In any situation that the GM feels is stressful, he will roll 3d. On a 6 or less, you have a flashback. The GM will roll whenever you miss a Fright Check or make the roll exactly, and whenever you fail a self-control roll for another stress-related disadvantage.
tZ5xQzBcSh8pJrBot.name: Flashbacks

features.situation: to ST vs. knockback
to resist Influence skills: Diplomacy, Fast-Talk, Intimidation, Savoir-Faire, Sex Appeal, and Streetwise

tyEnafPyOk0L5XO7N.notes: Make a self-control roll each morning upon awakening. If you fail, you suffered nightmares; this costs you 1 FP that you can only recover through sleep. On a roll of 17 or 18, you are left shaking, and are at -1 to all skill and Perception rolls for the entire day.
tyEnafPyOk0L5XO7N.name: Nightmares

tvGp9bpC0UQRzxv-j.name: Charitable
tvGp9bpC0UQRzxv-j.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

t7OW6thpm-ubuy7Xg.name: Overconfidence
t7OW6thpm-ubuy7Xg.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

tyy-ECq1iKxoW3Syz.name: Impulsiveness
tyy-ECq1iKxoW3Syz.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

tyuSDp0WpTDZfHEjm.name: On the Edge
tyuSDp0WpTDZfHEjm.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you face a life-threatening situation: piloting a burning vehicle, staring down an entire street gang while armed only with a toothbrush, etc. If you fail, you may not back down from the challenge – but you may roll again after every success roll or reaction roll relating to the situation. In combat, make a self-control roll every time you take your turn. If you fail, you must make an All-Out attack or engage in some other kind of near-insane, suicidal behavior.

features.situation: from others if they witness your On the Edge behavior, unless it is someone who values bravery over self-preservation (GM’s decision), who will react at +2 instead

trPCAqWJ2KfqmLv5H.name: Truthfulness
trPCAqWJ2KfqmLv5H.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must keep silent about an uncomfortable truth (lying by omission). Roll at -5 if you actually have to tell a falsehood! If you fail, you blurt out the truth, or stumble so much that your lie is obvious.

features.situation: from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

tJKfqiUhj7Cq2XvBZ.name: Curious
tJKfqiUhj7Cq2XvBZ.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

tF-m_RA1Q8RMGvf7K.name: Honesty
tF-m_RA1Q8RMGvf7K.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

features.situation: from others

tvLzA5pUdlyN9Hf3Y.name: Gluttony
tvLzA5pUdlyN9Hf3Y.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

sHbwGQm1T-lw0koLm.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
sHbwGQm1T-lw0koLm.name: Judo

Sep4N3vJtLFN91jXY.name: Five of the following
